A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Let down by this movie not because it is bad just not well thought out. Plot gets lost and common sense goes out the wind because of lazy writing. 40 minutes of this movie and the deaths of most of what was left of the resistance could have been avoided if Poe was told what was going on. So much of what I felt force awakens had built never amounted to anything is this movie. Many other plot holes from how physics in space works to how did rey get back to the falcon became to many for me to enjoy this movie.
